modules.name: Math
modules.documentation: This module contains methods for basic math operations.

methods.name: abs
methods.documentation: Returns the absolute value of a number.

methods.name: acos
methods.documentation: Returns the arccosine of a number.

methods.name: asin
methods.documentation: Returns the arcsine of a number.

methods.name: atan
methods.documentation: Returns the arctangent of a number.

methods.name: atan2
methods.documentation: Returns the arctangent of the quotient of its arguments.

methods.name: ceil
methods.documentation: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to a number.

methods.name: cos
methods.documentation: Returns the cosine of a number.

methods.name: exp
methods.documentation: Returns the value of E raised to the power of a number.

methods.name: floor
methods.documentation: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to a number.

methods.name: log
methods.documentation: Returns the natural logarithm (base e) of a number.
methods.detail: Math.log(x, base) -> Number // base defaults to e

methods.name: max
methods.documentation: Returns the largest of zero or more numbers.

methods.name: min
methods.documentation: Returns the smallest of zero or more numbers.

methods.name: pow
methods.documentation: Returns base to the exponent power, that is, baseexponent.

methods.name: random
methods.documentation: Returns a pseudo-random number between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).

methods.name: round
methods.documentation: Returns the value of a number rounded to the nearest integer.

methods.name: sin
methods.documentation: Returns the sine of a number.

methods.name: sqrt
methods.documentation: Returns the square root of a number.

methods.name: tan
methods.documentation: Returns the tangent of a number.

modules.name: System
modules.documentation: This module contains methods for system operations.

methods.name: read
methods.documentation: Reads a line from the standard input stream.

methods.name: readLine
methods.documentation: Reads a line from the standard input stream.

methods.name: write
methods.documentation: Writes a string to the standard output stream.

methods.name: writeLine
methods.documentation: Writes a string to the  standard output stream with a newline.

modules.name: Date
modules.documentation: This module contains methods for date and time operations.

methods.name: new
methods.documentation: Creates a new Date object.
methods.detail: Date.new(year, month, day, hour, minute, second, millisecond) -> Date

methods.name: now
methods.documentation: Returns the current date and time in a human readable format.

methods.name: nowUTC
methods.documentation: Returns a string representing the current date and time in UTC.

methods.name: parse
methods.documentation: Parses a string representation of a date and time.

methods.name: getDay
methods.documentation: Returns the day of the week of a date.

methods.name: getFullYear
methods.documentation: Returns the year of a date.

methods.name: getHours
methods.documentation: Returns the hour of a date.

methods.name: getSeconds
methods.documentation: Returns the seconds of a date.

methods.name: getMilliseconds
methods.documentation: Returns the milliseconds of a date.

methods.name: getMinutes
methods.documentation: Returns the minutes of a date.

methods.name: getMonth
methods.documentation: Returns the month of a date.

methods.name: getTime
methods.documentation: Returns number of milliseconds since a date.

modules.name: Path
modules.documentation: This module contains methods for working with file paths.

methods.name: basename
methods.documentation: Returns the basename of the path.

methods.name: dirname
methods.documentation: Returns the directory name of the path.

methods.name: extname
methods.documentation: Returns the extension of the path.

methods.name: isAbsolute
methods.documentation: Returns true if the path is absolute.

modules.name: Env
modules.documentation: This module contains methods for working with environment variables.

methods.name: get
methods.documentation: Returns the value of an environment variable.

methods.name: set
methods.documentation: Chanages or adds an environment variable. When setting a variable, the value must be a string. Returns a boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

methods.name: delete
methods.documentation: Deletes an environment variable. Returns a boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.

methods.name: getAll
methods.documentation: Returns an object containing all environment variables.

modules.name: JSON
modules.documentation: Module for working with JSON data.

methods.name: parse
methods.documentation: Parses a JSON string and returns an Alden object.

methods.name: generate
methods.documentation: Generates a JSON string from an Alden object.

modules.name: HTTP
modules.documentation: This module contains methods for working with HTTP.

methods.name: get
methods.documentation: Sends a HTTP GET request to a given URL. Returns a result object.

methods.name: post
methods.documentation: Sends a HTTP POST request to a given URL. Returns a result object upon success.

modules.name: Base64
modules.documentation: This module contains methods for working with base64.

methods.name: encode
methods.documentation: Base64 encode a given string.

methods.name: decode
methods.documentation: Base64 decode a given string.

modules.name: Hashlib
modules.documentation: Module containing methods for working with different hash algorithms.

methods.name: sha256
methods.documentation: Hashes a given string using the SHA-256 algorithm.

methods.name: hmac
methods.documentation: Generates a HMAC using the SHA-256 algorithm.

methods.name: bcrypt
methods.documentation: Generates a bcrypt hash.

modules.name: Process
modules.documentation: Module containing methods for working with the process.

methods.name: exec
methods.documentation: Executes a given command and returns the result object. Waits for the command to finish before returning.

methods.name: run
methods.documentation: Executes a given command and returns the result object. Does not wait for the command to finish before returning.

builtins.name: println
builtins.documentation: Prints a value to stdout with a newline.
builtins.detail:
println(10, 'testing', none, true) // 10
testing
 none
true

builtins.name: delay
builtins.documentation: Delay the program for a given amount of milliseconds.

builtins.name: input
builtins.documentation: Retrieves input from stdin and returns value as a string

builtins.name: typeof
builtins.documentation: Returns the type of a given value as a string.

builtins.name: assert
builtins.documentation: Raise a runtime error if the given expression is not true.

builtins.name: isDefined
builtins.documentation: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the given value is defined or not.
